context_bundle.summary: Rust traits and generics - trait definitions, implementations, bounds, associated types, orphan rule, monomorphization.

onboarding.quick_start: trait Foo { fn bar(&self); } - define interface. impl Foo for MyType {} - implement. fn process<T: Foo>(x: T) - generic with bound.
common_patterns: impl<T: Display> ToString for T { ... } // blanket impl
fn process(item: &impl Summary) // impl trait syntax
where T: Clone + Debug // where clause for bounds
